√aś1 'attain'

present: [5.] aśnóti  aśnuté etc. V.+   -- aśniyāt  aśnīs  

perfect: ānáṅśa  ānaśús etc. V.+  ānaśé etc. V.+  ānāśa  ānaśadhve   -- āśatus etc.  āśāthe etc.  

aorist: [1.] ā́ṣṭa  aśyát  aśīta etc.  aṣṭu  āśi   -- [2.] aśema  aśemahi   -- [3.] āśiśat  ākṣi  ákṣat   -- [5.] āśiṣṭa  

future: [1.] aśiṣyate  aśnuviṣyāmahe   -- [2.] aśitā  aṣṭā  

[secondary: aśāśya-  aśiśiṣa-  āśaya-  ]

derivatives: áṅśa V.+  áṣṭi V.+  aśana B.+  aśī- VS1.  -aśnuva AGS.  -aśnuvín VS.  -āśa ÇÇS.  ā́śā V.+  

Compare √1akṣ and √2naś (to which latter the forms ānaṭ etc. are here referred). Derivatives more doubtfully referable to this root are:

áśan RV.  aśáni V.+  áśna RV.  áśman V.+  áśri V.+  áśru V.+  áśva V.+  áṣṭrā V.+  āśiná RV.  āśú V.+  ā́śīyas B.  áśiṣṭha V.B.U.
